sql.name: queryXhHouseLoanAuditList
sql.sqlString: select a.HOUSE_ADDRESS,/*房屋所在地*/ a.HOUSE_AROUND_OBJECT,/*房屋周边设施*/ a.HOUSE_BANK_MORTGAGE_VALUE,/*银行抵押金额*/ a.LOAN_REASON,/*用款目的*/ a.REPAY_SOURCE,/*还款来源*/ a.MAKABLE_VALUE,/*可放款金额*/ a.OTHER_AUDIT_INFO,/*其它审核信息*/ a.BUILDING_AREA,/*房屋建筑面积*/ a.BUILDING_YEARS,/*房屋年限*/ a.ADUIT_UNIT_PRICE,/*综合评定单价*/ a.MARKET_UNIT_PRICE,/*市场价值*/ a.MEDIUM_ONE_NAME,/*中介1名称*/ a.MEDIUM_ONE_PRICE,/*中介1收房价*/ a.MEDIUM_TWO_NAME,/*中介2名称*/ a.MEDIUM_TWO_PRICE,/*中介2收房价*/ a.MEDIUM_THREE_NAME,/*中介3名称*/ a.MEDIUM_THREE_PRICE,/*中介3收房价*/ a.ADUIT_STATE,/*审核状态*/ a.ADUIT_RESULT,/*审核结果*/ a.ADUIT_SUGGESTION,/*审核意见*/ a.ID from XH_HOUSE_LOAN_AUDIT a where 1=1 $sql
